Changelog
=========

All notable changes to the Clean Architecture FastAPI Template will be documented in this file.

The format is based on `Keep a Changelog <https://keepachangelog.com/en/1.0.0/>`_,
and this project adheres to `Semantic Versioning <https://semver.org/spec/v2.0.0.html>`_.

[Unreleased]
------------

[1.0.0] - 2025-10-01
--------------------

Added
~~~~~

* Initial release of Clean Architecture FastAPI Template
* Clean Architecture implementation with 4 layers (Domain, Application, Infrastructure, Presentation)
* FastAPI integration with async support
* Multiple database support (PostgreSQL, MySQL, SQLite)
* Multiple cache backends (Redis, KeyDB, Tarantool, Dragonfly)
* Message broker integration (Kafka, RabbitMQ, NATS)
* Dishka dependency injection
* SQLAlchemy 2.0 with async support
* Alembic database migrations
* Docker and Docker Compose configuration
* Comprehensive Makefile with development commands
* Ruff for linting and formatting
* MyPy for type checking
* Pytest test suite with async support
* Pre-commit hooks configuration
* Structured logging with structlog
* Environment-based configuration with pydantic-settings
* API documentation with Swagger/OpenAPI
* Comprehensive project documentation
* Multiple license options
* GitHub Actions CI/CD workflows

Features
~~~~~~~~

* **Architecture**: Domain-Driven Design with clear separation of concerns
* **Async Support**: Full async/await support throughout the stack
* **Type Safety**: Complete type hints with MyPy validation
* **Testing**: Unit, integration, and e2e test examples
* **Code Quality**: Automated linting, formatting, and type checking
* **Docker**: Multi-stage builds for production, development, and testing
* **Migrations**: Automatic migration generation with Alembic
* **DI Container**: Dishka for clean dependency management
* **Logging**: Structured JSON logging for production
* **Configuration**: Environment-based settings with validation

Template Variables
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

* ``project_name`` - Human-readable project name
* ``project_slug`` - Python package name
* ``project_description`` - Project description
* ``author_name`` - Author name
* ``author_email`` - Author email
* ``github_username`` - GitHub username
* ``version`` - Initial version
* ``python_version`` - Python version (3.10, 3.11, 3.12)
* ``use_database`` - Database choice (none, postgresql, mysql, sqlite)
* ``use_cache`` - Cache choice (none, redis, keydb, tarantool, dragonfly)
* ``use_broker`` - Message broker (none, kafka, rabbitmq, nats)
* ``add_docker`` - Include Docker configuration
* ``add_tests`` - Include test suite
* ``add_docs`` - Include documentation
* ``add_precommit`` - Include pre-commit hooks
* ``license_type`` - License (MIT, Apache-2.0, GPL-3.0, BSD-3-Clause, None)
